questions.question: にほんご（＿）　すこし　わかります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～が わかる - to understand something

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「日本語がわかります」 = “I understand Japanese.”

  • に - used for direction, not subject
  • を - object marker (often incorrect with “わかる”)
  • と - “with” or “and,” not used here
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is が.

  • に - used for direction, not subject
  • を - object marker (often incorrect with “わかる”)
  • と - “with” or “and,” not used here

questions.question: まいばん　おふろ（＿）　はいります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～に はいる - to enter or take (a bath, etc.)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「おふろにはいります」 = “I take a bath.”

  • を - object marker, not used with “はいる”
  • が - subject marker
  • と - “with” or “and”
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker, not used with “はいる”
  • が - subject marker
  • と - “with” or “and”

questions.question: あした　プール（＿）　およぎます。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で およぐ - to swim at a location

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「プールでおよぎます」 = “I will swim at the pool.”

  • を - object marker
  • に - direction, destination
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is で.

  • を - object marker
  • に - direction, destination
  • が - subject marker

～に はいる - to enter into a place

「教室に入ってください」 = “Please enter the classroom.”

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action, not used with “はいる”
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is に.

  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action, not used with “はいる”

  • が - subject marker
  • で - place of action

questions.question: としょかん（＿）　ほんを　かりました。

「図書館で借りました」 = “I borrowed it at the library.”

  • に - destination or direction
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is で.

  • に - destination or direction
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: この しゃしん（＿）　だれが　とりましたか？
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～は - topic marker, used for emphasis in questions

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「この写真はだれがとりましたか？」 = “Who took this picture?”

  • を - object marker
  • に - direction or recipient
  • が - subject marker for 'who'
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is は.

  • を - object marker
  • に - direction or recipient
  • が - subject marker for 'who'
